channel.title: Arch on Jan's site
channel.description: Recent content in Arch on Jan's site

item.title: My Arch Linux experience
item.description: So I had an old ThinkPad T510 lying around in my room and I wondered what I could do with it: The BIOS was last updated in 2012 and the preinstalled Windows 10 ran on a 2,5" HDD with a capacity of 160GB. As expected, the Windows experience was terrible, especially when considering the whole machine runs with 4GB of RAM. First, it was clear I had to replace the HDD with a decent 2,5" SATA SSD.
